body: Ight bro, I didn't think that I could enjoy a The legend of Heroes doujin lmao

Well, sure, her act gives mixed feelings to every player, there is this understandable part that her household wasn't exactly at the most ideal as she grew up after her father's death. 

Her mother was not too involved in raising her for example. She let herself drown in work for what happened to her husband.
The husband was very much admired by her daughter and then learn he's involved in the production of weapons of mass destruction? The messy mind that was stabilized by certain factors got shaken once more by this revelation.
